description: Details pursuant to Condition 5 (Surface Water Drainage Scheme) of planning permission ref. 76760/APP/2022/1889 dated 11-12-2023 (Demolition of three dwellings (Nos. 14 and 16 Pield Heath Road and 2 Pield Heath Avenue) and one Bed and Breakfast (No. 18 Pield Heath Road), and the subsequent erection of a part two, part three storey (plus basement) 60-bed care home, with 14 car parking spaces, landscaping and external amenity space)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: 14-18 Pield Heath Road & 2 Pield Heath Avenue
decision_conditions: The submitted details fail to demonstrate how surface water drainage can be managed satisfactorily to comply with Policies SI 12 and SI 13 of the London Plan (2021), and as such, it is considered that the submitted details have failed to meet the requirements of Condition 5 (Surface Water Drainage Scheme) of planning permission ref. 76760/APP/2022/1889 dated 11-12-2023.
